definition: turned about in order or relation, a proposition obtained by conversion, to carry on a conversation
details:
adjective
- turned about in order or relation
= synonyms: reversed, transposed
- of words so related that one reverses the relation denoted by the other
= example: of words so related that one reverses the relation denoted by the other
noun
- a proposition obtained by conversion
verb
- to carry on a conversation
= synonyms: discourse
